site.name: UW Course Map
site.disclaimer: UW Course Map is not affiliated with the University of Wisconsin-Madison.

tips.shiftToOpenGraph: Hold shift to open course graph directly.

validation.atLeastOneOption: At least one option must be selected
validation.selectOneOption: Please select at least one search option.

banner.announcement: We're still actively developing this site. If you encounter any issues, please report them!

announcement: We just launched! Please star us on GitHub

hero.title: Course exploration, made easy
hero.description: Explore the courses offered by the UW-Madison in a visual and interactive way.

upload.title: Upload
upload.description: Upload your transcript to automatically analyze and visualize your completed courses.

visualFirst.title: Visual First
visualFirst.description: View an interactive map of a department and course relationships to explore course offerings.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Built by UW-Madison students, for students. Contribute to our open-source project on GitHub.

dataFriendly.title: Data Friendly
dataFriendly.description: Download or immediately access our data via API to build your own tools and insights.

cta.title: Start Exploring Courses
cta.description: Start browsing UW's courses and our course maps, or head over to our GitHub to see our roadmap and contribute to the project.

statistics.title: Aggregated Statistics
statistics.subtitle: Dynamic Insights from Multiple Sources
statistics.description: UW Course Map brings everything into one place—pulling data from Rate My Professor, Madgrades, UW-Madison's Course & Enroll, Course Guide, and more—so you can view key metrics (GPA, prerequisite paths, average ratings, distributions, etc.) all in a single dashboard.

explorer.title: Explorer
explorer.description: Start by looking up a course or program offered by the University of Wisconsin-Madison.

frequentlyVisited.title: Frequently Visited
frequentlyVisited.description: Not sure where to start? Here are some fun and random facts about the courses, instructors, and programs offered by the University of Wisconsin-Madison.

easiestCourses.title: Easiest Courses
easiestCourses.description: These classes are pretty much guaranteed to get you an A, if you want to take an easy class.

mostRatedInstructors.title: Most Rated Instructors
mostRatedInstructors.description: Who has the most ratings on Rate My Professors, regardless of their rating? We've got the top 100.

universityGraph.title: University Graph
universityGraph.description: All the prerequisite relations at UW-Madison, visualized. It's computationally expensive, so it may take a while to load.

requestFeature.title: Request Another Fact
requestFeature.description: If you have an idea for a fun fact or feature, let us know!

schedule.timezoneInfo: All times shown in America/Chicago timezone.
schedule.noScheduleInfo: No schedule information available for this course.
schedule.exportDescription: Select which sections you want to export. The file will work with Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, Outlook, and other calendar apps.

prerequisites.mapDescription: Visual representation of course prerequisites and related courses.
prerequisites.mapNote: Note: We aren't showing all possible requisite relationships, only those that are directly relevant to the course.

help.title: Prerequisite Explorer Help
help.description: Learn how to navigate and interact with the course dependency graph

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.findCoursesDesc: Search with Ctrl+K or explore visually
